attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned want all overseas aid suspended, until our own countries problems have been resolved.

All those citizens affected by the recent floods should be given the appropriate aid. The Billions wasted on foreign aid must be put to better use in protecting this country from more natural disasters, and ensuring the safety of the voting public.

The money must be put into developing our own crumbling infrastructure, which successive governments has chosen to erode at the cost to it own citizens. We want better flood defenses, hospitals, roads and rail systems, the list goes on.

Stop wasting our money! 

 

 

SUSPEND OVERSEAS AID NOW.
